speech: You can apply for internships through our official portal at https://github.com/jayanibv/AI-FAQ-Chatbot. The process includes registration, uploading your resume, and completing a short assessment.
Just head over to our portal and fill out the form — it’s simple and quick! You’ll need your resume and a few basic details.

Sure! Here's how to apply:

1. Visit our internship portal

2. Register with your email

3. Upload your resume

4. Take a short eligibility quiz
You’ll get updates via email.
Internship applications are open at https://github.com/jayanibv/AI-FAQ-Chatbot. Register, upload your resume, and you’re good to go!
We’re always excited to welcome new interns! Apply through our official site — just submit your resume and complete the application steps. Best of luck!
Applications are accepted via our official platform. You'll need to register, provide basic academic info, and upload your CV. Details are shared with selected candidates.

data.text: Where do I submit my application?
How can I apply for an internship?
